rewards.description:
This week marks 5 years since Phasmophobia launched on Steam and the very first Ghost Hunters were sent to investigate reports of paranormal activity. 

To say the following 5 years surpassed everything we at Kinetic Games could have ever imagined would be an understatement and we are forever grateful to over 25 million of you who have joined us on this journey so far. 

To celebrate, we're offering the Veteran ID Card and Badge as a Twitch Drop for all Phasmophobia streamers for one week only!
rewards.name: 5th Anniversary Drop

timeBasedDrops.name: Veteran Animated ID Card and Badge

rewards.description:
Get ready for Operation: IRON VIPER – a limited-time Twitch Drops event designed to reward loyal viewers with exclusive in-raid loot, rare gear, and powerful tools for survival.

Whether you're grinding PvP or running PvE missions, watching your favorite Ghosts of Tabor streamers can now earn you daily timed rewards just for tuning in. From experimental keycards to rare consumables, this drop campaign is stacked to give you the edge in Tabor.

Each day brings a new tiered lineup of unlockable gear. Simply watch participating streamers and let your watch time stack – the longer you watch, the better the reward.
rewards.name: Op: Iron Viper Day 2

rewards.description:
Get the Legendary Forsaken Chaos Shotgun in Borderlands 4! These guns will be located in-game in your Rewards Center of your first character at your CURRENT level (minimum of 5).
Watch two (2) hours any creator playing Borderlands 4 between September 11 and September 30. Your SHiFT account must be linked to your gaming platform and Twitch for proper redemption. For any issues with redemption, please contact support.borderlands.com.
rewards.name: Forsaken Chaos Gun

rewards.description:
Get the Legendary Midnight Defiance Sniper Rifle in Borderlands 4! These guns will be located in-game in your Rewards Center for your first character at your CURRENT level (minimum of 5). 
Watch two (2) hours of our partnered creators playing Borderlands 4 between September 11 and September 30. Your SHiFT account must be linked to your gaming platform and Twitch account for proper redemption. For any issues with redemption, please contact support.borderlands.com.
rewards.name: Midnight Defiance Gun

rewards.description:
✨ Blackwater’s Slumber Party ✨

Hey Sleepy Heads! 💤 

This month marks the final chance to grab the remaining Nighttime Bundle cosmetics. everything from a gentleman’s pipe to a blanket, pillow, and the cozy Pyjama Hat! 🎩🛏️

Don’t miss out on the fun, invite your friends, jump into Castle of Blackwater, or tune into the stream to watch the party unfold.

So… what snacks and drinks are you bringing to the Slumber Party? 🍿🥤
rewards.name: Blackwater Pyjama Party 2

rewards.description: 🎮 Announcing Kakele Online's Epic Twitch Drops!  Embark on a unique journey in Kakele's realm. Dive into mystical lands, conquer quests, and enjoy our exciting Twitch Drops for enhanced gaming. Unlock rewards, including teleports, herbs, potions, and materials.  🕒 Timed Rewards: Enjoy cities Teleports, Ultra potions, Gold Refiner Kits and collect Dog Cards and Trophies.  💰 Prosperity Path: Gain Copper, Tin, Silver, Iron, Gold, Life Herbs, Mana Herbs for success. Accumulate Reputation Coins.  🎈 Grand Finale: End with an exclusive Twitch Drop and Bacon Extravaganza surprise! Link accounts, watch streams, and claim rewards for an unforgettable RPG experience.  🌟 How to Join:  Link Accounts: Connect your account and Twitch in the game app. Watch Streams: Tune in during to your favorite Kakele streamer. Claim Rewards: Receive Twitch Drop notifications claim in the game app.  Influencers: To enable drops on your stream, email us!  Don't miss the chance to enrich your journey with Twitch Drops!
rewards.name: Kakele Online September 2

rewards.description: ABI’s Full Release is now live! To celebrate the launch of S3 on Steam and Epic, we've prepared a New Round Exclusive Streamers Support Event—this time, we’re releasing 4 new streamer stickers, and in response to popular demand, we’re bringing back 5 streamer stickers from the NS1 Season. Viewers will be rewarded for gifting subscriptions to these eligible streamers in the Arena Breakout: Infinite (ABI) category: ImOw, GL40LabsRaT, HITBOXKING, Arven93, LVNDMARK, QuattroAce, Kritikal, BakedJake, Ralisco. Support your favorite eligible streamers and receive the exclusive Stickers! Note that Viewers who claimed any of these streamer stickers during NS1 cannot re-claim the same stickers this time, and subscriptions will only count toward the event task if gifted while the streamer is live and broadcasting ABI content.
rewards.name: Partner Sticker Sub-Drops

rewards.description: ABI’s Full Release is now live! To celebrate the launch of S3 on Steam and Epic, watch Arena Breakout: Infinite content with enabled Twitch Drops to unlock up to 2 skins! Watch for 2 hours: claim the new season Exclusive Skin Reward - Plaster M24 Bolt-Action Rifle! Watch for 4 hours: claim the FRS Event Exclusive Reloaded Skin - DZ Style AKM Assault Rifle! Please link your Level Infinite Pass account and Twitch account on the event page (https://www.arenabreakoutinfinite.com/twitchdrops ), and claim your Drops rewards in time.
rewards.name: S3 Steam Launch Drops

rewards.description: ABI’s Full Release is now live! To celebrate the launch of S3 on Steam and Epic, we've prepared a New Round Exclusive Streamers Support Event—this time, we’re releasing 4 new streamer stickers, and in response to popular demand, we’re bringing back 5 streamer stickers from the NS1 Season. Viewers will be rewarded for gifting subscriptions to these eligible streamers in the Arena Breakout: Infinite (ABI) category: ImOw, GL40LabsRaT, HITBOXKING, Arven93, LVNDMARK, QuattroAce, Kritikal, BakedJake, Ralisco. Support your favorite eligible streamers and receive the exclusive Stickers! Note that Viewers who claimed any of these streamer stickers during NS1 cannot re-claim the same stickers this time, and subscriptions will only count toward the event task if gifted while the streamer is live and broadcasting ABI content.
rewards.name: Partner Sticker Sub-Drops

rewards.name: Anno 117 Public Demo 2

rewards.description: Between Sept 16 - Oct 13, watch any Voyagers of Nera stream to earn this exclusive cosmetics like the mana flare and a unique Skimmer skin.
rewards.name: Early Access Launch!

rewards.description: Between Sept 16 - Oct 13, subscribe to streamers in the Voyagers Creator Program or sponsored streams to unlock a unique Infused Stone Glider skin to use in game!
rewards.name: Early Access - Echoes

rewards.description: Get your Battle Chest and Legendary Card packs in this latest drop!
rewards.name: September Evergreen Drop

rewards.description:
Welcome to Mecha BREAK Season 1 Drops Event.  
Claim rewards at: https://mechabreak.seasungames.com/p/zt/2024/07/25/twitch-drop/
All rewards must be claimed before November 20, 2025, at 08:00 (UTC-8)
rewards.name: Mecha BREAK S1 Drops Pt.1

rewards.description: The Global Deconstruction Staff is the third campaign in the Orbital Collection. The campaign includes a Profile Icon, Portrait Frame, and a Deconstruction Staff skin.
rewards.name: Global Decon. Staff

rewards.description: Anglerfish Luo outfit will be available to everyone at the in-game Item Shop during 10/23/2025 21:00 - 10/26/2025 21:00 (PT). Get your Cookies ready!
rewards.name: 2-YEAR CELEBRATION DROP
